Class Remix

java.lang.Object
  com.mattwilliamsnyc.service.remix.Remix

public class Remix
extends java.lang.Object

Constructor Detail

Remix

public Remix(java.lang.String apiKey)
Creates a new Remix API client. API keys may be obtained after registering for a developer account with Best Buy.

Parameters:
apiKey - Identifier used to authenticate API requests
